events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect item delivery.
An agent has been assigned to handle the customer's refund case regarding the wrong product.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I'm here to assist you with your refund.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received along with your order number to proceed with the refund?
I have attached the photo of the wrong item and included my order number as requested, hoping to resolve this quickly.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately and provide a return label for the incorrect product.
I appreciate the quick response and refund offer; thank you for resolving this issue promptly.
The refund has been processed, and a return shipping label has been sent to your email.
Just following up to ensure you received the refund and that everything is satisfactory with your service.
Since the refund was received and there are no further issues, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting us.
We have sent you a short survey link to provide feedback on how we handled your refund request.
